revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SorcererBishopEntry'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns a {{Class|SorcFX3Explosion}} at the location of the calling actor and plays the {{Property|SeeSound}} on the Voice channel. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SorcFX3}} and derived classes.
